attributes.action: Take down the 'Rejected Petitions' Twitter page
attributes.background: The 'Rejected Petitions' Twitter page has made a mockery of the democracy we live in. People should have the freedom to make petitions without judgement.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition, as the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

Removing a Twitter profile is a decision for Twitter.
